title: RARE HAMPDEN COURT ONE BEDROOM  $1600
posting_body: QR Code Link to This Post
Spacious one bedroom with walk-in closet/hall closets on lovely tree-lined street.
City view in full amenities building with night and TV security system, pool, deck, sauna, bike room, cheery laundry room and party space with views.
Close to park, busses, Trader Joe's, shops.
Heat, AC and basic cable included.
Application and credit report required along with security deposit of one month's rent.
Available September 1 for one year lease.
Ready for showing in late July/early August.
